title: Acidovorax bellezanensis sp. nov., a novel bacterium from uranium mill tailings repository sites with selenium bioremediation capabilities
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Iván Sánchez-Castro, Tomeu Viver, Pablo Martínez-Rodríguez, Esteban Bustos-Caparros, Miguel Ángel Ruiz-Fresneda, María Teresa Mena-Sanabria, Ignacio Jiménez-García, Germán Bosch-Estévez, Michael Descostes, Mohamed Larbi Merroun
